## Voice.isFullScreenNotificationEnabled() method

Returns a boolean representing whether or not Android Full Screen notifications are enabled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isFullScreenNotificationEnabled(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A `Promise` that - Resolves `false` if either of the following is true: - Full Screen Notifications are disabled in your app's configuration. See `docs/disable-full-screen-notifications.md` for more info. - The app was not granted Full Screen Notification permissions by the operating system. - Resolves `true` if none of the above is true. - Rejects if the Android layer encountered an error.

## Remarks

Unsupported platforms: - iOS
